title: Wagers on Fed Rate Cuts Seal Treasuries’ Best Week in Months
description: Wagers that slowing inflation will allow the Federal Reserve to cut interest rates at least twice this year drove Treasury yields to their lowest levels of the year, adding to the biggest weekly gain in months.
content: Wagers that slowing inflation will allow the Federal Reserve to cut interest rates at least twice this year drove Treasury yields to their lowest levels of the year, adding to the biggest weekly gain in months.
